thread.section_title: Superior Van and Mobility Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Superior Van and Mobility | www.superiorvan.com
thread.title: Shernice
thread.title_full: Superior Van and Mobility reviewed by Shernice

author: Shernice
title: Shernice
text: I rented my mobility from the Evansville location. Lauren and her staff were courtesy and professional. I had reserved the van for the day on a Saturday but I finished my business in four hours. Superior Van contacted me on Monday and told me they were not going to charge me for the full day because that was the right thing to. What business does that?
